description:
Outputs to:
A) enhance national advisory committee to coordinate and  monitor HDR production and research team capacity.
B)  recruit research team, to collect literature review and establish a peer review 
C) The first draft of NHDR developed.

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
Enhanced national and sub-national capacities to plan, monitor, evaluate, and implement the MDGs and related national development policies and priorities through
1. The national advisory committee capacity is enhanced to coordinate and  monitor HDR production as well as research team capacity.
2. The first draft of NHDR is developed
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Preparation of National Human
